thread.section_title: Fabletics Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Fabletics | fabletics.com | 46 of 522
thread.title: Sheila Platt

author: Sheila Platt
title: Sheila Platt
text: Due to the weird configuration of my neighborhood my mail, including packages, gets delivered to the wrong house. Your website would not let me add the second optional line to the delivery address. Which means my package will probably be delivered to the wrong house. If someone fills in that optional line then your website should recognize it and use it. If your website isn't going to allow for the optional line then remove it from your website.
